sen.j: 平 盛綱（たいら の もりつな、生没年不詳）は平安時代末期の武将。
sen.e: TAIRA no Moritsuna (dates of birth and death unknown) is a busho (Japanese military commander) at the end of Heian period.
TAIRA no Moritsuna (dates of birth and death unknown) is a busho (Japanese military commander) during the end of Heian period.

sen.j: 平盛国の子、もしくは盛国の子平盛俊の子と言われる。
sen.e: He is said to be the son of either TAIRA no Morikuni or TAIRA no Moritoshi.
He is said to have been a son of either TAIRA no Morikuni or TAIRA no Moritoshi who was Morikuni's son.
sen.cmt: 「盛国の子」の訳がないためそれを補充（追加）。その他表現の見直し。
sen.e: He is said to have been a son of either TAIRA no Morikuni or TAIRA no Moritoshi who was Morikuni's son.

sen.j: 盛国らと同様に平清盛に仕え、承安 (日本)4年（1174年）には「盛国の別功の賞」をもって左兵衛尉に任官、安元元年（1175年）には内舎人正に任ぜられ、治承2年（1178年）には主馬頭を兼任した。
sen.e: He served TAIRA no Kiyomori with Morikuni etc., and in 1174, under the 'Morikuni's special award,' he was appointed Sahyoe no jo, central secretariat officer in 1175, and the manager of the Bureau of Imperial Mews in 1178.
sen.cmt: 「盛国の別功の賞」 定訳不明

He served TAIRA no Kiyomori with Morikuni etc., and in 1174, under the 'Morikuni's special award,' he was appointed Sahyoe no jo, central secretariat officer in 1175, and the manager of the Bureau of Imperial Mews in 1178.

sen.j: 降って治承4年（1180年）には左衛門尉の任にあったと『山槐記』に記されている。
sen.e: "Sankaiki" says that he was a Saemon no jo (third-ranked officer of the left division of outer palace guards) in 1180.

sen.j: また讃岐国守にも任じ、号として「高橋」を名乗ったという。
sen.e: He also served as Kokushi of Sanuki province and called himself Takahashi.

sen.j: 養和元年（1181年）に平家の侍大将の一人として墨俣川の戦いに参加。
sen.e: In 1181, he took part in the Battle of Sunomatagawa as one of the samurai daisho (a warrior who gives the order of battle and maneuvers the troops) of the Taira family.
In 1181, he took part in the Battle of Sunomatagawa as one of the samurai daisho (a warrior who gives the order of battle and maneuvers to the troops) of the Taira family.

sen.j: 敵将の一人義円を討ち取って名を挙げた。
sen.e: He was renowned for killing one of the enemies, Gien.
He became renowned for killing one of enemy generals, Gien.

sen.j: その後源義仲追討の戦いにも出陣したようであるが、その終焉の地については不明である。
sen.e: He seems to have also took part in the fight to track down and kill MINAMOTO no Yoshinaka but the place where he died is unknown.
